upload_file(local_path: str, destination_path: str) → Any[source]

Upload a file to OneDrive (automatically handles small and large files)

Args:

local_path: Path to the local file destination_path: Destination path in OneDrive (e.g., /Documents/file.pdf)

Returns:

Dict containing file metadata including id, name, size, etc.

authenticate(auth_code: str, redirect_uri: str, scopes: List[str] | None = None) → Any[source]

Authenticate with OneDrive using authorization code.

Parameters:

  • auth_code – Authorization code from OAuth flow

  • redirect_uri – Redirect URI used in OAuth flow

  • scopes – List of scopes to request (defaults to Files.ReadWrite)

Returns:

True if authentication successful

Create a new folder.

Parameters:

  • folder_path – Name of the folder to create

  • parent_path – Parent folder path (default: root)

Returns:

Folder metadata dict

Create a sharing link for a file.

Parameters:

  • file_path – File path or ID

  • link_type – Type of link (‘view’ or ‘edit’)

  • scope – Scope of link (‘anonymous’ or ‘organization’)

Returns:

Sharing link information

Delete a folder from OneDrive.

Parameters:

  • folder_path – Folder path or ID to delete

  • force – If True, delete even if folder is not empty

Download a file from OneDrive.

  • local_path – Local path to save file (optional)
